result.eng: The father from whom he got that habit.
result.ga: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.orig: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.html: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.
result.ponchtml: An t-aṫair ónar ṫóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.

result.eng: We should build on that goodwill.
result.ga: Ba cheart tógáil ar an deathoil sin
result.orig: Ba cheart tógáil ar an deathoil sin
result.html: Ba cheart tógáil ar an deathoil sinWe should build on that goodwill.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart tógáil ar an deaṫoil sinWe should build on that goodwill.

result.eng: They were bringing up a family.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag tógáil clainne
result.orig: Bhí siad ag tógáil clainne
result.html: Bhí siad ag tógáil clainneThey were bringing up a family.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag tógáil clainneThey were bringing up a family.

result.eng: How long will it take them?
result.ga: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.orig: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.html: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthuHow long will it take them?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḟad a ṫógfaiḋ sé orṫuHow long will it take them?

result.eng: Where were you raised?
result.ga: Cár tógadh thú
result.orig: Cár tógadh thú
result.html: Cár tógadh thúWhere were you raised?
result.ponchtml: Cár tógaḋ ṫúWhere were you raised?

result.eng: A pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ga: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.orig: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.html: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ponchtml: Níl cead pinn luaiḋe a úsáid aċ aṁáin ċun nótaí a ṫógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.

result.eng: He took the car and went.
result.ga: Thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.orig: Thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.html: Thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leisHe took the car and went.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé an carr agus d'imiġ leisHe took the car and went.

result.eng: It took me half a year to write the book.
result.ga: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.orig: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.html: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobhIt took me half a year to write the book.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé leaṫḃliain orm an leaḃar a scríoḃIt took me half a year to write the book.

result.eng: He took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ga: Thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.orig: Thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.html: Thóg sé scian amach as a phócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé scian amaċ as a ṗócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.

result.eng: He built a house.
result.ga: Thóg sé teach
result.orig: Thóg sé teach
result.html: Thóg sé teachHe built a house.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé teaċHe built a house.

result.eng: It will be built exactly as planned.
result.ga: Thógfar é díreach mar atá sé beartaithe
result.orig: Thógfar é díreach mar atá sé beartaithe
result.html: Thógfar é díreach mar atá sé beartaitheIt will be built exactly as planned.
result.ponchtml: Ṫógfar é díreaċ mar atá sé beartaiṫeIt will be built exactly as planned.

result.eng: They have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ga: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.orig: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.html: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ponchtml: Tá plean acu líne traenaċ nua a ṫógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.

result.eng: Take it out of the bag.
result.ga: Tóg as an mhála é
result.orig: Tóg as an mhála é
result.html: Tóg as an mhála éTake it out of the bag.
result.ponchtml: Tóg as an ṁála éTake it out of the bag.

result.eng: Take it off the chair.
result.ga: Tóg den chathaoir é
result.orig: Tóg den chathaoir é
result.html: Tóg den chathaoir éTake it off the chair.
result.ponchtml: Tóg den ċaṫaoir éTake it off the chair.

result.eng: Take bearings for the coast.
result.ga: Tóg treo i leith an chósta
result.orig: Tóg treo i leith an chósta
result.html: Tóg treo i leith an chóstaTake bearings for the coast.
result.ponchtml: Tóg treo i leiṫ an ċóstaTake bearings for the coast.

result.eng: An interesting question was raised in the meeting.
result.ga: Tógadh ceist shuimiúil sa chruinniú
result.orig: Tógadh ceist shuimiúil sa chruinniú
result.html: Tógadh ceist shuimiúil sa chruinniúAn interesting question was raised in the meeting.
result.ponchtml: Tógaḋ ceist ẛuimiúil sa ċruinniúAn interesting question was raised in the meeting.

result.eng: I was raised in Belfast.
result.ga: Tógadh i mBéal Feirste mé
result.orig: Tógadh i mBéal Feirste mé
result.html: Tógadh i mBéal Feirste méI was raised in Belfast.
result.ponchtml: Tógaḋ i mBéal Feirste méI was raised in Belfast.

result.eng: The journey takes four hours.
result.ga: Tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloig
result.orig: Tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloig
result.html: Tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloigThe journey takes four hours.
result.ponchtml: Tógann an turas ceiṫre huaire an ċloigThe journey takes four hours.

result.eng: I would like to rent a house for a week in the month of April.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom teach a thógáil ar cíos ar feadh seachtaine i mí Aibreáin
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom teach a thógáil ar cíos ar feadh seachtaine i mí Aibreáin
result.html: Ba mhaith liom teach a thógáil ar cíos ar feadh seachtaine i mí AibreáinI would like to rent a house for a week in the month of April.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom teaċ a ṫógáil ar cíos ar feaḋ seaċtaine i mí AibreáinI would like to rent a house for a week in the month of April.

result.eng: She was born and raised in Ros an Mhíl, but we live in Leitir Mucú now.
result.ga: Rugadh agus tógadh í i Ros an Mhíl ach tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anois
result.orig: Rugadh agus tógadh í i Ros an Mhíl ach tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anois
result.html: Rugadh agus tógadh í i Ros an Mhíl ach tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anoisShe was born and raised in Ros an Mhíl, but we live in Leitir Mucú now.
result.ponchtml: Rugaḋ agus tógaḋ í i Ros an Ṁíl aċ tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anoisShe was born and raised in Ros an Mhíl, but we live in Leitir Mucú now.

result.eng: Open the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ga: Oscail an doras a Thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.orig: Oscail an doras a Thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.html: Oscail an doras a Thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ponchtml: Oscail an doras a Ṫomáis agus tóg amaċ an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.

result.eng: I was born and raised here.
result.ga: Rugadh agus tógadh anseo mé
result.orig: Rugadh agus tógadh anseo mé
result.html: Rugadh agus tógadh anseo méI was born and raised here.
result.ponchtml: Rugaḋ agus tógaḋ anseo méI was born and raised here.

result.eng: It's where I was born and raised.
result.ga: Is ann a rugadh agus a tógadh mé
result.orig: Is ann a rugadh agus a tógadh mé
result.html: Is ann a rugadh agus a tógadh méIt's where I was born and raised.
result.ponchtml: Is ann a rugaḋ agus a tógaḋ méIt's where I was born and raised.

result.eng: Goodbye, Éanna. Take it easy!
result.ga: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog é
result.orig: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog é
result.html: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog éGoodbye, Éanna. Take it easy!
result.ponchtml: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog éGoodbye, Éanna. Take it easy!

result.eng: Goodbye for now, Éanna. Take it easy!
result.ga: Slán go fóill a Éanna Tóg go bog é
result.orig: Slán go fóill a Éanna Tóg go bog é
result.html: Slán go fóill a Éanna Tóg go bog éGoodbye for now, Éanna. Take it easy!
result.ponchtml: Slán go fóill a Éanna Tóg go bog éGoodbye for now, Éanna. Take it easy!

result.eng: We built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ga: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.orig: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.html: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ponchtml: Ṫógamar claíṫe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saiġdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: Only poor people take the bus.
result.ga: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.orig: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.html: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an busOnly poor people take the bus.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫógann aċ daoine boċta an busOnly poor people take the bus.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.

result.eng: They grew up next door to each other.
result.ga: Tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iad
result.orig: Tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iad
result.html: Tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iadThey grew up next door to each other.
result.ponchtml: Tógaḋ sa doras ag a ċéile iadThey grew up next door to each other.
